infoPopup.title: System Data Settings
infoPopup.description: Configure the system-wide rules for attendance, leave policies, and employee time restrictions.

max_time_To_attend.label: Max Time to Attend
max_time_To_attend.description: The latest allowed time for employee check-in (format: HH:mm).

inputValidation.matches: Time must be in HH:mm format

min_time_To_Go.label: Min Time to Go
min_time_To_Go.description: The earliest allowed time for employee check-out (format: HH:mm).

inputValidation.matches: Time must be in HH:mm format

annualVacationMax10Years.label: Annual Vacation (≤10 Years)
annualVacationMax10Years.description: Number of annual vacation days allowed for employees with up to 10 years of service.

inputValidation.required: Annual vacation for ≤10 years is required
inputValidation.typeError: Annual vacation (≤10 years) must be a number
inputValidation.integer: Annual vacation (≤10 years) must be a integar number

annualVacationTillAgeIs50Years.label: Annual Vacation (≤50 Years)
annualVacationTillAgeIs50Years.description: Number of annual vacation days allowed for employees aged up to 50 years.

inputValidation.required: Annual vacation for ≤50 years is required
inputValidation.typeError: Annual vacation (≤50 years) must be a number
inputValidation.integer: Annual vacation (≤50 years) must be a number

annualVacationAfterAgeIs50Years.label: Annual Vacation (>50 Years)
annualVacationAfterAgeIs50Years.description: Number of annual vacation days allowed for employees aged above 50 years.

inputValidation.required: Annual vacation for >50 years is required
inputValidation.typeError: Annual vacation (>50 years) must be a number
inputValidation.integer: Annual vacation (>50 years) must be a integar number

maxNumberOfLeavesRequestPerMonth.label: Max Leave Requests per Month
maxNumberOfLeavesRequestPerMonth.description: Maximum number of leave requests an employee is allowed to submit each month.

inputValidation.required: Max number of leave requests per month is required
inputValidation.typeError: Max leave requests/month must be a number
inputValidation.integer: Max leave requests/month must be a integar number

maxDaysInCasulVaccationPerYear.label: Max Casual Leave Days per Year
maxDaysInCasulVaccationPerYear.description: Maximum number of casual leave days an employee can take in a single year.

inputValidation.required: Max casual leave days per year is required
inputValidation.typeError: Max casual leave days/year must be a number
inputValidation.integer: Max casual leave days/year must be a integar number
